column1:
Odeinoichus,"2018-03-21T13:13:35.837Z","Favorite Minifigures on the Go.","

Set #5004914 Armor Pod: Last year LEGO introduced the Pod style of Polybag. A small collectible hard plastic carrying case with a single Minifigure and accessories to go with it. Many Themes received these pods, for Nexo Knights we have the Armor Pod.
This is still a Polybag style item, so we’re going to cover the pros and cons of the item in question before giving our final thoughts.
Pros:

column2: Great print elements for the Pod pieces as well as the Minifigure.
Cheap way to get a great or favorite character from one of your favorite LEGO themes.
Clever new play and collect pattern for kids and folks who enjoy displaying their Minifigures in interesting ways.
Unique NEXO Power and Clay Minifigure included.

column1: Cons:

column2: Limited potential for building.
Limited potential for including in other LEGO displays, though clever MOC and parts re-users will definitely find some way to use these new parts.
Price when not given away as a free gift is a bit high considering the Pod inflates the costs of a typical Minifigure which is less than a Polybag.
Play factors also limited without other sets to bring this character into the other one.

column1: Overall opinion

This isn’t a bad new item from LEGO, as long as it’s a free gift with purchase. Five dollars or more for this item is a bit of a letdown though. Mostly because the Pod itself cannot attach anything to it on the outside, it’s more designed to slip it into a pocket or backpack and carry your favorite Minifigure with some accessories to your friend’s house to play with friends.

Can I recommend this set? I think if you’re looking for something unique and fun to display and collect I’d definitely say not to overlook these fun little items, but be aware that they will cost a lot now on the secondary market, especially for The LEGO Batman Movie pod, which is a huge factor to consider since there is a limited amount you can do with the parts included here. Mildly recommended with caution to be aware of the price.
